name: Dawnfly, Desolation Nymph
movement: 30 ft. walk, 15 ft. burrow, 15 ft. climb, 30 ft. swim
description: The Dawnfly, or Desolation Nymph, embodies cruel nature with a large size and a carapace that adapts to surroundings. It is equipped with a powerful Hinged Maw and utilizes its camouflage to ambush foes in natural habitats.
memorable: The ability to grapple and swallow its prey while using camouflage makes the Dawnfly a terrifying opponent in its natural environment.
goals: To hunt and lure prey within its natural habitat.
relations: Likely found in the company of other natural beasts or as a solitary predator.
environment: Typically thrives in natural terrain, including areas near water.
strengths: Good physical attack power with high Strength and Constitution, plus versatility in movement abilities.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma, limiting its strategic planning and social interaction.
attacks: Utilizes a powerful Hinged Maw attack with piercing damage, can grapple Medium or smaller enemies, and has a Swallow ability that restrains and blinds its prey.
most_powerful_ability: The Swallow action can incapacitate enemies, causing them to be blinded and taking ongoing acid damage while restrained.
senses: Has tremorsense out to 30 feet and a passive Perception of 13.
skills: Possesses a minimal perception skill, indicating a moderate awareness of its surroundings.
additional_information: Limited Amphibiousness allows breathing in both air and water.
Shifting Camouflage grants advantage on Stealth checks in natural terrains.
Can only swallow one creature at a time.
Grappling restricts its ability to attack other targets.
Water Jet can blind nearby foes, impacting combat control.
test_queries: large beast that can swim and burrow
natural camouflage beast in water and land
beast that swallows enemies and deals acid damage
large nymph that uses water jet attack
